text.autoconfig.fabric_macros.title: Fabric Macros Options
text.autoconfig.fabric_macros.option.mac: The index of the current macro in the Macro List being used.
When the macro is disabled automatically, schedule it at least this many ticks in the future.
When the macro is disabled automatically, schedule it at most this many ticks in the future.
text.autoconfig.fabric_macros.option.Mac: Macro will disable if vertical movement is detected at any point. Use this to combat unexpected holes.
Macro will disable if horizontal movement is not detected at any point before the Minimum Step Duration. Use this to combat unexpected obstructions.
Macro will calibrate the Step Duration for each step the next time it is run. Minimum Step Duration will be set to (Step Duration - 40) by default.
text.autoconfig.fabric_macros.option.Ste: Macro will stop if horizontal movement is obstructed before this many ticks have elapsed. Range: 10 - Step Duration
Macro will execute next step after this many ticks have elapsed (or more). Range: Minimum Step Duration and above
